welcome1: One day this year will be special for us, and we want to spend it surrounded by close ones and friends!
welcome2: With great pleasure, we invite you to a wonderful celebration – our wedding
address: Vėjų g. 22, Grigaičiai, 11237 Vilniaus r. sav.
mainGift: If you would like to give us a meaningful and practical gift, we would be very grateful for a contribution to the young family’s budget to help us fulfill our dream!
flowers: We kindly suggest not giving flowers, but if you really wish to, a lovely gesture for us would be a bottle of wine decorated with your wishes or lottery tickets to test our luck.
dressCodeInfo1: Your presence is the most important thing for us! However, we would be delighted if you could support the color scheme of our wedding with your outfits.
dressCodeInfo2: Black, for example, always looks stylish and elegant))
references: Here are a few references for inspiration:
agree: We would greatly appreciate it if you could let us know your decision by April 15, 2025.
contactsInfo: If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us through any of the contact methods you know!
story1: If you don't believe in online dating, we suggest reconsidering your perspective.
story2: It’s thanks to Tinder that we found each other!
story3: So many tears of joy, no one has ever seen anything like it!
story4: The most romantic proposal anyone could ever dream of...
story6: The day when both said YES!
story7: The day when the story of a new family began...
story9: A day with our dearest and closest ones!
story10: We want to share this event with the most important people in our lives.
